item.title: Report X-2024072086
item.description:
Report X-2024072086

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-29T09:15:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-18
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS RETRIEVED AND CONTAMINATED BOXES WERE CUT DOWN. THE 5 GALLON BUCKET INSIDE THE SOURCE LEAKER HAD A FLAMABLE LIQUID HAZARD LABEL. METAL 5 GALLON BUCKET IN A DOUBLE WALL BOX. PRODUCT WAS TOO THICK TO PH SO IT WAS CLEANED UP FOLLOWING THE FLAMABLE LIQUID PAGE OF THE RESPONDER BOOK WHICH IS THE APPROPRIATE PAGE.
